title: First BBS goes online Feb. 16, 1978
content:
On February 16, 1978, Ward Christensen and Randy Suess launched the first public dialup BBS, or bulletin board system, the predecessor of online discussion forums and web sites like Reddit and Digg. An electronic bulletin board over dialup With no

The post First BBS goes online Feb. 16, 1978 appeared first on The Silicon Underground.
